name: Machine Invaders
description:
The free world is being invaded by the evil steam machines! The space academy has sent out all available pilots to destroy the enemy forces, but it won't be easy.

You are a brave hero sent to the front line, and assuredly to your death. You goal is simple: shoot down as many enemies as possible to give time to the academy to research better ship upgrades!

Theme: Steam
Limitation: Death isn't the end
Created: 18-20th of March 2022 for the Mini Jam 102: Steam

Music: Slow Motion & Voxel Revolution by bensound.com
Sound: Pixabay (pixabay.com) & Mixkit (mixkit.co)
